notices.settingsUpdated: Full Calendar has updated your calendar settings to a new format.
notices.chronoAnalyserMobileDisabled: The Chrono Analyser feature is only available on the desktop version of Obsidian.
notices.chronoAnalyserLoadFailed: Failed to load Chrono Analyser. Please check the console.
notices.chronoAnalyserConfigureFirst: Please configure your Insight Groups first using the ⚙️ icon.
notices.chronoAnalyserGeneratingInsights: Generating insights (this may take a moment)...
notices.chronoAnalyserInsightsFailed: Failed to generate insights. Check the developer console for errors.
notices.googleAuthFailed: Google authentication failed. Please try again.
notices.bulkUpdateError: Error during bulk update. Check console for details.
notices.timezoneChanged: System timezone changed to {{timezone}}. Full Calendar view updated to match.
notices.revalidationFailed: One or more remote calendars failed to load. Check the console for details.
notices.cannotOpenRemote: Cannot open note for a remote event.

bulkCategorization.noNotesFound: No local event notes found to categorize.

bulkDecategorization.noNotesFound: No local event notes found to de-categorize.

desktopInitialView.label: Desktop initial view
desktopInitialView.description: Choose the initial view range on desktop devices.

mobileInitialView.label: Mobile initial view
mobileInitialView.description: Choose the initial view range on mobile devices.

displayTimezone.label: Display timezone
displayTimezone.description: Choose the timezone for displaying events. Defaults to your system timezone. Changing this will reload the calendar.

clickToCreateEvent.label: Click on a day in month view to create event
clickToCreateEvent.description: Switch off to open day view on click instead.

enableReminders.label: Enable event reminders
enableReminders.description: Show a desktop notification 10 minutes before an event starts.

firstDay.label: Starting day of the week
firstDay.description: Choose what day of the week to start.

timeFormat24h.label: 24-hour format
timeFormat24h.description: Display the time in a 24-hour format.

enable.label: Enable business hours
enable.description: Highlight your working hours in time-grid views to distinguish work time from personal time.

days.label: Business days
days.description: Select which days of the week are business days.

startTime.label: Business hours start time
startTime.description: When your working day begins (format: HH:mm)

endTime.label: Business hours end time
endTime.description: When your working day ends (format: HH:mm)

slotMinTime.label: Earliest time to display
slotMinTime.description: Set the earliest time visible in time grid views (format: HH:mm)

slotMaxTime.label: Latest time to display
slotMaxTime.description: Set the latest time visible in time grid views (format: HH:mm)

weekends.label: Show weekends
weekends.description: Whether to display weekend days (Saturday and Sunday) in the calendar

hiddenDays.label: Hidden days
hiddenDays.description: Select days of the week to hide from the calendar

dayMaxEvents.label: Max events per day (month view)
dayMaxEvents.description: Limit the number of events shown per day in month view

enableBackgroundEvents.label: Enable background events
enableBackgroundEvents.description: Allow events to be displayed as background elements for things like vacations, focus time, or class schedules.

showEventInStatusBar.label: Show current event in status bar
showEventInStatusBar.description: Display the title of the currently running event in the Obsidian status bar.

heading.label: Heading
heading.description: Heading to store events under in the daily note.

zeroConfig.label: Zero Configuration Required
zeroConfig.description: This provider automatically reads your existing Obsidian Tasks plugin settings. All tasks with due dates will be displayed on the calendar as read-only events.

readOnly.label: Read-Only Calendar
readOnly.description: Tasks can be viewed but not modified through the calendar interface. To edit tasks, use the Tasks plugin or modify your notes directly.

enable.label: Enable advanced categorization (Title-based)
enable.description: Enable category-based coloring and unlock timeline views. This will modify event note titles and allow timeline visualization by category.

disable.modalDescription: Disabling this feature will remove known category prefixes from your event titles and will permanently delete all saved category color settings.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.description: Create and manage calendar workspaces. Each workspace can have its own view settings, visible calendars, and filters.

quickStart.title: Quick Start: Add Your First Calendar
quickStart.description: To begin, add a calendar source using the "+" button in the "Manage calendars" section.

options.label: Options
options.endReminderTooltip: An end reminder requires a specific end time.

tooltips.recurringTaskCompletion: Completion for recurring tasks can be toggled on individual instances in the calendar view.
tooltips.dailyNoteRecurring: Recurring events are not supported in Daily Notes. Please use a 'Full Note' calendar instead.
tooltips.inheritedEvent: This event inherits from a recurring series. To edit it, first open the series note.

deleteRecurring.title: Delete Recurring Event
deleteRecurring.description: This is a recurring event. What would you like to do with all of its future "override" instances (i.e., events that you have dragged or modified)?

deleteInstance.name: Delete only this instance
deleteInstance.description: Delete only the instance on {{date}}. This will skip this date in the recurrence.

promoteChildren.name: Promote child events
promoteChildren.description: Turn all overriden events (if any) into standalone, single events. They will no longer be linked to this recurring series.

deleteAll.name: Delete child events
deleteAll.description: Delete all future override events associated with this recurring series. This cannot be undone.

name.label: Name
name.description: A unique name for this workspace

defaultDate.label: Default date (optional)
defaultDate.description: Date to jump to when activating workspace (e.g., "today", "2024-01-01")

visibleCalendars.label: Visible calendars
visibleCalendars.description: Select which calendars to show (leave empty to show all)
visibleCalendars.noCalendars: No calendars configured. Configure calendars in the main settings first.

categories.label: Categories
categories.description: Select categories to include/exclude (leave empty to show all)
categories.noCategories: No categories configured. Configure categories in the Categorization settings.
categories.requiresAdvanced: Category filtering requires Advanced Categorization to be enabled in the main settings.

overrideBusinessHours.label: Override business hours
overrideBusinessHours.description: Enable custom business hours for this workspace

enableBusinessHours.label: Enable business hours
enableBusinessHours.description: Show business hours highlighting in this workspace

businessDays.label: Business days
businessDays.description: Select which days of the week are business days

businessHoursStart.label: Business hours start time
businessHoursStart.description: When your working day begins (format: HH:mm)

businessHoursEnd.label: Business hours end time
businessHoursEnd.description: When your working day ends (format: HH:mm)

timelineCategories.label: Timeline categories
timelineCategories.description: Default state for timeline category groups

slotMinTime.label: Earliest time to display
slotMinTime.description: Override the earliest time visible in time grid views (format: HH:mm)

slotMaxTime.label: Latest time to display
slotMaxTime.description: Override the latest time visible in time grid views (format: HH:mm)

weekendDisplay.label: Weekend display
weekendDisplay.description: Override whether to show weekends in the calendar

hiddenDays.label: Hidden days
hiddenDays.description: Override which days to hide from the calendar

dayMaxEvents.label: Max events per day (month view)
dayMaxEvents.description: Override the maximum number of events to show per day in month view

bulkCategorize.title: Choose a Bulk-Update Method
bulkCategorize.description: How would you like to automatically categorize existing events in your local calendars? Note that this is a one time operation that will modify your event notes to match the required formatting.

smartFolder.name: Use Parent Folder (Smart)
smartFolder.description: Use parent folder names as the category for UN-categorized events. Events that already look like 'Category - Title' will be skipped.

forcedFolder.name: Use Parent Folder (Forced)
forcedFolder.description: PREPENDS the parent folder name to ALL event titles, even if they already have a category. Warning: This creates nested categories.

forcedDefault.name: Forced Default Update
forcedDefault.description: Prepends a category you provide to ALL event titles. If a category already exists, the new one will be added in front (e.g., New - Old - Title).

google.title: Google Accounts
google.noAccounts: No Google accounts connected. Add a calendar source to connect an account.

selectCalendars.title: Select Calendars from {{email}}
selectCalendars.noCalendars: No new calendars found, or all calendars from this account have been added.
selectCalendars.description: Choose which calendars you would like to add to Obsidian.
